price: ចំណែកឯពួកដែលគ្មានជំនឿ និងបានបដិសេធនឹង អាយ៉ាត់ៗរបស់យើងនោះ ពយកទាំងនោះជាពួកឋាននរកជើហ៊ីម។
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā ulāika aṣḥābu al-jaḥīmi
